ai-ya3.3.1:1.1_0: One who understands the sense-spheres, having completely understood the sense-spheres,
ai-ya3.3.1:2.1_0: One who understands the dimension of infinite space and completely understands it,
ai-ya3.3.1:3.1_0: The sense fields does not completely understand the eye, having become clear, there is no earlieration.
ai-ya3.3.1:4.1_0: One who doesn’t understand the dimension of infinite consciousness, and doesn’t completely understand it.
